name: Mortgage servicer companies; mortgage loan originators
text:
An employee who performs mortgage loan originator activities for a mortgage servicer company is exempt from registration and licensure as a mortgage loan originator; provided that:
     (1)  The employee's actions are part of the employee's duties as an employee of the mortgage servicer company; and
     (2)  The employee provides mortgage loan originator services only with respect to a residential mortgage loan modification. [L 2012, c 252, pt of §1; am L 2014, c 198, §10]
